info.name: Internal Wallet Service
info.description:
Virtual wallet service API — manages TOP_UP, BONUS, and SPEND transactions with double-entry ledger, deadlock avoidance, and idempotency guarantees.

Seeded user IDs:
- Treasury:  00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001
- Alice:     00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002 (500 GOLD)
- Bob:       00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000003 (1000 GOLD)
- Charlie:   00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000004 (50 DIAMOND)

response.name: 400 Bad Request — Validation error
404 Not Found — User has no wallet for asset
409 Conflict — Concurrent duplicate
